author: Adam van der Zwan
title: Isolation measures could be damaging for psychiatric patients, B.C. mother fears
description: A Victoria mother says she's deeply concerned that isolation measures experienced by her son in an acute psychiatric ward could be impeding his recovery.
content:
A Victoria mother says she's deeply concerned that isolation and distancing measures experienced by her son in an acute psychiatric ward could be impeding his recovery.
